description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity Risk Management.
name: HITRUST CSF - Risk Management Program

values.description: A framework is used to provide the foundation and organizational arrangement for the design, implementation, monitoring, review and continuous improvement of a comprehensive information security and privacy risk management program.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Risk Mgmt Program: 0.a Risk Management Framework
